TopicTitle: How to increase the size of an explosion?

Articles.Content:
I'm working on fuel tanks and bombs.

Is there a way to adjust how explosive a tank is.

Not crash tolerence

Not fullExplosionPotential

I'd like to know this as well.

Although it looks like it might be difficult, since no one has done this before when clearly explosions are the motive of our fellow engineers.
I remember reading somewhere that fuel Explosion Potential depends on the amount of fuel the part contains. so more fuel = bigger explosion. =) makes sense right!?
